Package Logic

Class LeaderBoard

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
Logic.LeaderBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class LeaderBoard
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
The class that represents the leaderboard which can be saved, loaded, visualized extends AbstractTableModel to be able to pass as a model for a JTable
See Also:
Serialized Form
